item.title: X-Mooks Rules
item.description: X-Mooks is my homebrew OSR-compatible rule system which is HEAVILY based on: Many Rats on a Stick by Skerples. PDF. If there’s something missing here, namely Wizard Schools, refer to that document to find some, if nothing speaks to you there refer to the Extra Resources section for more options. Core Rules Â¶ The X-Mooks rules are designed for old-school D&D-like games. They are broadly compatible with most published Old School Revival (OSR) products (i.
